    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/kashmir-tour-packages" title="Kashmir">Kashmir</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2e66132438_78890994" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/honeymoon-in-kashmir.jpg" alt="Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package" title="Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Newly married? Looking for a place to spend your honeymoon calmly? Then Kashmir which is the mini Switzerland of India will be your preferred destination of choice. Namaste India Trip offers you a honeymoon in Kashmir tour package of 6 days and 5 days where you and your loved one can ignite your love and spend some quality time together away from the crowd.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Srinagar</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>You will be arriving in Srinagar where our tour representative will transfer you to a houseboat or a hotel, where you can rest and relax in the afternoon. During the evening you will be taken for a Shikara ride on the calm lake which will be extremely soothing. You will also witness the mesmerizing floating island and lotus gardens which are present inside the lake. As the sun sets, you will be taken back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Srinagar – Gulmarg – Khilanmarg – Srinagar</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your journey towards the breathtaking town of Gulmarg will commence in the morning after breakfast. After covering a distance of 1 hour and 40 mines you will be reaching Gulmarg, where you will be made to leave for Khilanmarg which is accessible through a cable car ride, from where you will be able to view the unparalleled beauty of Kashmir Valley. You are free to indulge in a pony ride in the open meadows where there is a lake – which remains frozen till the month of June.</p>
<p>Finally, you will be driven back to Srinagar for night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Gulmarg – Pahalgam</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your full day trip to Pahalgam will commence early in the morning. Upon covering a 3 hours journey to this enthralling destination on the hills you will be duly checked in to your hotel, where you will be spending the night. Your evening time will be free for you to stroll around on foot and buy yourself some souvenir like, shawls, carpets, willow baskets, handicrafts and so much more.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Pahalgam Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>You will be taken to Chandanwari – which is located at a distance of 16 km from Pahalgam, after breakfast. This place is accessible only by a jeep or a pony which can be hired directly. It is one of the most idyllic and picturesque places which provides breathtaking views throughout the year making it the perfect place for spending your honeymoon and creating lifetime memories. Adventure seekers can opt for trekking around this region. After a day filled with fun and frolic, you will be taken back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Pahalgam – Srinagar</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After a leisurely morning, you will be driven to the Kashmiri capital of Srinagar – which is located at a distance of 3 hours from Pahalgam. En route you will be made to visit the 1100-year-old temple of Lord Vishnu, Awantipura. Upon arriving at Srinagar you will be checked in to your hotel or houseboat, for an overnight stay. During the afternoon you will be made to visit the temple of Shankaracharya – which is located at a whopping height of 1,000 feet above sea level and is dedicated to Lord Shiva along with paying a visit to the vibrant Mughal gardens – whose beauty cannot be compared.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Srinagar Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your honeymoon tour package of Kashmir will commence today after you are transferred to the airport, from where you will head on towards your preferred destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package Home » India » Kashmir » Kashmir Honeymoon Tour Package Tour Overview Newly married? Looking for a place to spend your honeymoon calmly? Then Kashmir which is the mini Switzerland of India will be your preferred destination of choice. Namaste India Trip offers you a honeymoon in Kashmir tour package of...
